name: Pooka Needs Souls
description:
You play as the last minion to the God Pooka, named Doug. Doug on his way to resurrect Pooka with harvested souls, tripped and scattered all the souls. With the resurrection time close, Doug must quickly combine all the souls to resurrect Pooka while avoiding traps and creatures.

COMBINING SOULS

2 Yellow Souls = 1 Green Soul

2 Green Souls = 1 Purple Soul

2 Purple Souls = 1 Multicoloured Soul

CONTROLS

Interact /
Combine /
DropMovement

HINTS / TIPS

Death has no real consequence, you can use death to spawn quickly to Pooka's Altar.

8 yellow souls are spawned at game start.

You need a combined multicoloured soul in order to win.

WARNING

Mild blood particles.

CREDITS

Music by Andrea Baroni

Created for the Wanna X Yam Game Jam 2022
